title: Regression Calculator – Linear Regression, Correlation & Prediction

formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: Regression line: \( y = a + bx \) \( b = \dfrac{\sum (x_i - \bar{x})(y_i - \bar{y})}{\sum (x_i - \bar{x})^2} \) \( a = \bar{y} - b\bar{x} \) Correlation: \( r = \dfrac{\sum (x_i - \bar{x})(y_i - \bar{y})}{\sqrt{\sum (x_i - \bar{x})^2 \sum (y_i - \bar{y})^2}} \) R²: \( R^2 = 1 - \dfrac{\text{SSE}}{\text{SST}} \)
